name: Air Traffic Disruptor
description: Loosely inspired by Space invaders, Air Traffic Disruptor flies you into a world where the skies are MUCH busier and every flight is a flurry of dodging planes, mountains, UFOS, meteors, and so much more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Pentium Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
